be.ac.ulb.infof307.g01.model

Class PokemonModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g01.model.PokemonModel

  • public class PokemonModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Model of a pokemon. A pokemon represents the generic pokemon entity, such as "Pikachu". A pokemon spotted on the map is represented by MarkerModel.
